author: Louise Radnofsky
title: U.S., Allies Expel Scores of Russians in Response to Former Spy’s Poisoning
text:
The U.S., Canada and more than a dozen European Union states expelled scores of Russian diplomats, intelligence officers and other officials in a coordinated response to the poisoning in the U.K. of a former Russian spy and his daughter, which Western countries say was likely carried out by Moscow.

The U.S. is ejecting 60 Russians it identified as intelligence officers—48 from the Russian embassy and 12 from the permanent mission to the United Nations, senior administration officials said, in part over objections to what they...
